# rehype-minify-attribute-whitespace

Minify white-space in attributes.

## Install

```sh
npm install rehype-minify-attribute-whitespace
```

## Example

##### In

```html
<a href="  http://example.com "></a>
```

##### Out

```html
<a href="http://example.com"></a>
```
